00042 CLexiconPresenter::CLexiconPresenter(ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00043     : CSwordPresenter(useModules, parent,name),
00044     m_key( new CSwordLDKey(m_moduleList.first()) )
00045 {
00046     m_key->key("");
00047 //  m_key->SWKey::operator=( TOP );
00048 //  *m_key = TOP;
00049 
00050     initView();
00051     show();
00052     initConnections();          
00053     
00054     setInitialized();
00055 }
00056 
00057 CLexiconPresenter::~CLexiconPresenter(){
00058     delete m_key;
00059 }

00062 void CLexiconPresenter::initView(){
00063     qWarning("CLexiconPresenter::initView()");
00064     
00065     m_mainToolBar = new KToolBar(this);
00066     m_keyChooser = CKeyChooser::createInstance(m_moduleList.first(), m_key, m_mainToolBar);
00067     m_mainToolBar->insertWidget(0,m_keyChooser->sizeHint().width(),m_keyChooser);   
00068     m_mainToolBar->setItemAutoSized(0);
00069     addToolBar(m_mainToolBar);
00070     
00071 //  m_displaySettingsButton = new CDisplaySettingsButton( &m_displayOptions, &m_moduleOptions, m_moduleList, m_mainToolBar);
00072 //  m_mainToolBar->insertWidget(1,m_displaySettingsButton->sizeHint().width(),m_displaySettingsButton);
00073 
00074     m_moduleChooserBar = new CModuleChooserBar(m_moduleList, CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon, this );
00075     addToolBar(m_moduleChooserBar);
00076     
00077     m_htmlWidget = new CHTMLWidget(true, this);
00078         
00079     //setup popup menu
00080     m_popup = new KPopupMenu(this);
00081     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Lexicon window"));
00082     
00083     m_copyPopup = new KPopupMenu(m_popup);  
00084     m_copyPopup->insertItem(i18n("Entry"), this, SLOT(copyEntry()),0,ID_PRESENTER_COPY_ONLY_KEY);
00085     m_copyPopup->insertItem(i18n("Text of entry"), this, SLOT(copyEntryText()),0,ID_PRESENTER_COPY_KEY_TEXT);   
00086     m_copyPopup->insertItem(i18n("Entry with text"), this, SLOT(copyEntryAndText()),0,ID_PRESENTER_COPY_KEY);
00087     m_copyPopup->insertSeparator();
00088     m_copyPopup->insertItem(i18n("Selected text"), m_htmlWidget, SLOT(copy()),0,ID_PRESENTER_COPY_SELECTED);
00089     
00090     m_printPopup = new KPopupMenu(m_popup);
00091     m_printPopup->insertItem(i18n("Entry with text"), this, SLOT(printEntry()),0,ID_PRESENTER_PRINT_KEY);
00092 
00093     m_savePopup = new KPopupMenu(m_popup);  
00094     m_savePopup->insertItem(i18n("Entry as plain text"), m_htmlWidget, SLOT(slotSaveAsText()),0,ID_PRESENTER_SAVE_CHAPTER);
00095     m_savePopup->insertItem(i18n("Entry as HTML"), m_htmlWidget, SLOT(slotSaveAsHTML()),0,ID_PRESENTER_SAVE_CHAPTER_HTML);  
00096 
00097     m_popup->insertItem(i18n("Select all"), m_htmlWidget, SLOT(slotSelectAll()),0, ID_PRESENTER_SELECT_ALL);
00098   m_popup->insertItem(i18n("Lookup selected text in lexicon"), m_lexiconPopup, ID_PRESENTER_LOOKUP);    
00099     m_popup->insertSeparator(); 
00100     m_popup->insertItem(SmallIcon(ICON_EDIT_COPY),i18n("Copy..."),  m_copyPopup, ID_PRESENTER_COPY_POPUP);  
00101     m_popup->insertItem(SmallIcon(ICON_FILE_PRINT), i18n("Add to printing queue..."), m_printPopup, ID_PRESENTER_PRINT_POPUP);  
00102     m_popup->insertItem(SmallIcon(ICON_FILE_SAVE), i18n("Save..."),     m_savePopup,ID_PRESENTER_SAVE_POPUP);       
00103 
00104 
00105     m_htmlWidget->installPopup(m_popup);    
00106     m_htmlWidget->installAnchorMenu(m_popup);
00107     m_htmlWidget->setModules(m_moduleList); 
00108 
00109     setCentralWidget(m_htmlWidget);
00110     setIcon(LEXICON_ICON_SMALL);
00111 }

00114 void CLexiconPresenter::initConnections(){
00115     qWarning("CLexiconPresenter::initConnections()");
00116     connect(m_htmlWidget, SIGNAL(referenceClicked(const QString&, const QString&)),
00117         this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&, const QString&)));
00118     connect(m_htmlWidget, SIGNAL(referenceDropped(const QString&)),
00119         this, SLOT(referenceDropped(const QString&)));
00120 
00121     connect(m_keyChooser, SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)),
00122         this, SLOT(lookup(CSwordKey*)));
00123     connect(m_popup, SIGNAL(aboutToShow()),this,
00124         SLOT(popupAboutToShow()));
00125     connect(m_moduleChooserBar, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), this,
00126         SLOT(modulesChanged()));
00127 }
00128 
00130 void CLexiconPresenter::lookup(CSwordKey* key){
00131     qWarning("CLexiconPresenter::lookup(CSwordKey* key)");
00132     setUpdatesEnabled(false);   
00133     
00134     CSwordLDKey* ldKey = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(key);
00135     if (!ldKey)
00136         return;
00137 
00138     backend()->setFilterOptions( m_moduleOptions );
00139     backend()->setDisplayOptions( m_displayOptions );
00140 
00141     m_moduleList.first()->module()->SetKey(*ldKey);
00142     
00143     if (m_moduleList.first()->getDisplay()) {   //do we have a display object?
00144         if (m_moduleChooserBar->getModuleList().count() > 1)  //we want to display more than one module
00145             m_moduleList.first()->getDisplay()->Display( &m_moduleList );
00146         else
00147             m_moduleList.first()->getDisplay()->Display( m_moduleList.first() );
00148         m_htmlWidget->setText(m_moduleList.first()->getDisplay()->getHTML());
00149     }   
00150     if (m_key != ldKey)
00151         m_key->key(ldKey->key());
00152         
00153     setUpdatesEnabled(true);
00154     setCaption( windowCaption() );
00155     qWarning("finished CLexiconPresenter::lookup(CSwordKey* key)");
00156 }
00157 
00159 void CLexiconPresenter::popupAboutToShow(){
00160     m_popup->setItemEnabled(ID_PRESENTER_LOOKUP, !m_htmlWidget->selectedText().isEmpty());
00161 
00162     m_copyPopup->setItemEnabled(ID_PRESENTER_COPY_SELECTED, !m_htmlWidget->selectedText().isEmpty());   
00163 }
00164 
00166 void CLexiconPresenter::lookup(const QString& module, const QString& key){
00167     CSwordModuleInfo* m = backend()->findModuleByName(module);
00168     if (m && m_moduleList.containsRef(m)) {
00169         if (!key.isEmpty())
00170             m_key->key(key);
00171         m_keyChooser->setKey(m_key); //the key chooser does send an update signal   
00172     }
00173     else {
00174         emit lookupInModule(module, key);
00175     }
00176 }
00177 
00179 void CLexiconPresenter::refresh( ){
00180 
00181 //  CSwordPresenter::refresh(); //refreshes the display settings button
00182 
00183     lookup(m_key);
00184     m_htmlWidget->refresh();
00185 }
00186 
00188 void CLexiconPresenter::modulesChanged(){
00189   m_moduleList = m_moduleChooserBar->getModuleList();
00190   if (!m_moduleList.count())
00191     close();
00192   else {
00193 //      m_displaySettingsButton->reset(m_moduleList);
00194 //    refreshFeatures();
00195       m_key->module(m_moduleList.first());
00196       m_keyChooser->setModule(m_moduleList.first());    
00197         m_htmlWidget->setModules(m_moduleList);     
00198       lookup(m_key);
00199     }
00200 }
00202 void CLexiconPresenter::optionsChanged(){
00203     lookup(m_key);
00204 }
00205 
00207 void CLexiconPresenter::copyEntry(){
00208     CSwordLDKey key(m_moduleList.first());  //this key is deleted by the printem
00209     key.key(m_key->key());
00210     QString currentAnchor = m_htmlWidget->getCurrentAnchor();
00211     if (currentAnchor.left(8) == "sword://")
00212         currentAnchor = currentAnchor.mid(8, currentAnchor.length()-(currentAnchor.right(1) == "/" ? 9 : 8));
00213     key.key(currentAnchor);
00214         
00215     QClipboard *cb = KApplication::clipboard();
00216     cb->setText(key.key());
00217 }
00218 
00220 void CLexiconPresenter::copyEntryText(){
00221     CSwordLDKey key(m_moduleList.first());  //this key is deleted by the printem
00222     key.key(m_key->key());
00223     QString currentAnchor = m_htmlWidget->getCurrentAnchor();
00224     if (currentAnchor.left(8) == "sword://")
00225         currentAnchor = currentAnchor.mid(8, currentAnchor.length()-(currentAnchor.right(1) == "/" ? 9 : 8));
00226     key.key(currentAnchor);
00227     
00228     QClipboard *cb = KApplication::clipboard();
00229     cb->setText(key.strippedText());
00230 }
00231 
00233 void CLexiconPresenter::copyEntryAndText(){
00234     CSwordLDKey key(m_moduleList.first());  //this key is deleted by the printem
00235     key.key(m_key->key());
00236     QString currentAnchor = m_htmlWidget->getCurrentAnchor();
00237     if (currentAnchor.left(8) == "sword://")
00238         currentAnchor = currentAnchor.mid(8, currentAnchor.length()-(currentAnchor.right(1) == "/" ? 9 : 8));
00239     key.key(currentAnchor);
00240     
00241     const QString text = QString("%1\n%2").arg(key.key()).arg(key.strippedText());
00242     QClipboard *cb = KApplication::clipboard();
00243     cb->setText(text);
00244 }

00246 //print functions
00247 void CLexiconPresenter::printEntry(){
00248     CExportManager::printKey(m_moduleList.first(), m_key->key());
00249 }
00250 
00252 void CLexiconPresenter::insertKeyboardActions(KAccel* a){
00253     a->setConfigGroup("Lexicon window");    
00254     a->insertItem(i18n("Next entry"), "Next entry", 0);
00255     a->insertItem(i18n("Previous entry"), "Previous entry", 0); 
00256 }
00257 
00259 void CLexiconPresenter::initAccels(){
00260     CSwordPresenter::initAccels();
00261     m_accel->setConfigGroup("Lexicon window");  
00262     m_accel->insertItem(i18n("Next entry"), "Next entry", 0);
00263     m_accel->connectItem("Next entry", this, SLOT(nextEntry()));
00264         
00265     m_accel->insertItem(i18n("Previous entry"), "Previous entry", 0);       
00266     m_accel->connectItem("Previous entry", this, SLOT(previousEntry()));
00267         
00268     m_accel->readSettings();
00269 }
00270 
00272 void CLexiconPresenter::previousEntry(){
00273     m_key->PreviousEntry();
00274     m_keyChooser->setKey(m_key);
00275 }
00276 
00278 void CLexiconPresenter::nextEntry(){
00279     m_key->NextEntry();
00280     m_keyChooser->setKey(m_key);    
00281 }
